reviews.review: I have never wanted to shoot holes more than after having played this game. Not bullet holes though, go play and figure it out. It's a masterpiece.
Hikayesi güzel tek başınıza bile eğlenebileceğiniz puzzle oyunu.

It's not very often I go back & review something I played almost a decade ago, but I've been thinking quite a bit about the state of AAA gaming recently, and inevitably came to one single conclusion: Portal 2 is perhaps the best game of the past 10 years.

In a world where big budget games tend to be focused on either the cinematic instead of gameplay, draining your wallet through nefarious lootbox systems, or perhaps worst of all, attempting to be everything while not really succeeding at being anything (see every open world action adventure story driven experience with RPG elements & co-op/multiple support), Portal 2 just shines like a beacon of game design: A game where the gameplay never once suffers because of the story, and the story never once suffers because of the gameplay.

If I wanted to sit down & watch 20 minutes of drama with zero input I'd finally get around to watching Breaking Bad - Why on earth would I want that in a video game? Thankfully, Portal 2 manages to tell a both dramatic & hilarious story without detracting from the gameplay experience, which itself is spectacularly enjoyable in its own right. That unique marriage of narrative & gameplay is what's left Portal 2 at the forefront of my mind now, more than 9 years later.

In addition, the art continues to age well, & the soundtrack is one of the best of its kind out there. If that wasn't enough, the Workshop community has seemingly added a ton of extra content to the game over the years, so if you ever feel like the game is over but you want some more addictive portal puzzle solving action, there's plenty to be had!

Overall, as late as this review is relative to the release of the game, I could've wrote it just as easily back in 2011. Portal 2 is a special game, & looking at everything that's followed it since its release just highlights further what a brilliantly unique title it is.

Well here we are again.
It's always such a pleasure.
Remember when you tried
to kill me twice?
Oh how we laughed and laughed.
Except I wasn't laughing.
Under the circumstances
I've been shockingly nice.

You want your freedom?
take it.
That's what I'm counting on.

I used to want you dead
but
Now I only want you gone.

She was a lot like you.
(Maybe not quite as heavy).
Now little Caroline is in here too.
One day they woke me up -
So I could live forever.
It's such a shame the same

will never happen to you.

You've got your
short sad
life left.
That's what I'm counting on.
I'll let you get right to it -
Now I only want you gone.

Goodbye my only friend.
Oh, did you think I meant you?
That would be funny
if it weren't so sad.
Well you have been replaced.
I don't need anyone now.
When I delete you maybe
I'll stop feeling so bad.

Go make some new disaster.
That's what I'm counting on.
You're someone else's problem.

Now I only want you gone.
Now I only want you gone.
Now I only want you gone.

이 작품은 포탈1의 후속작인 포탈 2입니다.
전작에 이어 포탈건을 활용한 여러 퍼즐 풀기 등 전작의 재미요소는 확실히 가져왔습니다.
전작과 달라진점이라면 개선된 그래픽, 더 명확해진 스토리텔링, 그리고 더 커진 게임 볼륨까지 전작에 비해 엄청나게 진보한 게임성을 보여줬습니다.
만약 당신이 스토리와 퍼즐을 좋아하시는 분들이라면 꼭 해보시길 바랍니다.

One of the best singleplayer games out there. Good thing about this game is that you don't need to buy the first game to understand all the lore. I highly recommend it, wonderfull experience playing singleplayer campaing and co-op mode. Its a shame Valve never made Portal 3 but hey, on the bright side they ended the series on a good note.

Mais um ótimo jogo da Valve. Com certeza o melhor que já joguei.Ótima mecanica, puzzles bem elaborados e uma historia impressionante. O que mais me impressiona é a própria hístoria que surpreende, mas claro que é bom jogar Portal 1 para ententer. Caso queira um jogo só pela gameplay também funciona, o multiplayer é muito interessante, com uma mecanica da necessidade da dupla trabalhar em equipe para concluir as fases. A vilâ Glados com certeza é a melhor vilã de jogos nesses ultimos tempos.
Vale a pena comprar, terá muitas horas de diversão e um humor na medida certa

So much fun. Getting a proper comic to do the voice overs was well worth doing.
The segway links are hillarious and worth having the game just for these bits. Even the end is worth watching all the way through.
Puzzles are clever and challenging.
Two player version is well worth doing too.
Looks great. Plays great.
One of my faves.

Портальные изделия 2. Хотелось бы сказать что игра распологает кооперативное прохождение с другом,что может не радовать, и уже заслуживает большой плюс. Что касается сингл плеера, кол-во уровней выросло в разы,посравнению с первой частью и игра не проходится за 3 часа. Очень классно и атмосферно выполнена, если проходить в первый раз дает задуматся над некоторыми уровнями. Поэтому всем рекомендую опробовать свой мозг на логику и мышление. 10 кубов из 10

Jogo bem imersivo, onde ao decorrer da história criei diversas teorias sobre o início e o final do game. Uma das maiores características da franquia é o desafio que ela passa em que, tive que solucionar diversos puzzles onde fiquei preso várias horas.

A melhor parte de Portal 2 (assim como o Portal 1) é a sua rica narrativa, que se entendida corretamente e bem aprofundada pode acabar sendo sinistra e obscura, apresentando diversos Easter Eggs espalhados durante a jogatina, onde pude entender um pouco mais sobre o que se passava no local.

Eben war ich noch da aber jetzt bin ich dort?! Genau das ist Portal 2. Du springst durch das Portal und hoffst einfach das du nicht schon wieder in irgendwelche Fallen gerätst. Das Spiel im Coop Modus macht grundsätzlich mehr Spaß - gerade wenn man seinen Kollegen "versehentlich" in eine Falle fliegen lässt. Die Aufgaben in Portal 2 sind gut zu meistern aber brauchen manchmal mehrere Anläufe. Ansich hat das Spiel auch einen guten Suchtfaktor und ist gut für ein Spiel für zwischendurch. 

Kaufempfehlung, aber am besten mit Freunden!
